TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit PublisherIdentityPermission extends System.Security.CodeAccessPermission
Public NotInheritable Class PublisherIdentityPermission Inherits CodeAccessPermission
public ref class PublisherIdentityPermission sealed : System::Security::CodeAccessPermission

summary.span: Represents the identity of a software publisher.

span.span: Represents the identity of a software publisher.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，不使用标识权限。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], identity permissions are not used. > > 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，标识的权限不能具有权限状态值。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, identity permissions cannot have an permission state value. 从.NET Framework 2.0 版开始，标识权限可以具有任何权限状态值。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, identity permissions can have any permission state value. 这意味着在 2.0 及更高版本中，标识权限具有相同的行为与实现接口。This means that in 2.0 and later versions, identity permissions have the same behavior as permissions that implement the interface. 即，请求的标识始终成功，而不考虑程序集，标识程序集已被授予完全信任。That is, a demand for an identity always succeeds, regardless of the identity of the assembly, if the assembly has been granted full trust. > > 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，对标识权限的要求是有效，即使调用程序集是完全受信任。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, demands on the identity permissions are effective, even when the calling assembly is fully trusted. 也就是说，尽管调用程序集具有完全信任，但如果程序集不符合要求的条件故障的标识权限的需求。That is, although the calling assembly has full trust, a demand for an identity permission fails if the assembly does not meet the demanded criteria. 从.NET Framework 2.0 版开始，标识权限的要求是如果调用程序集具有完全信任关系无效。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, demands for identity permissions are ineffective if the calling assembly has full trust. 这可确保所有权限，消除标识权限的处理方式的一致性。This assures consistency for all permissions, eliminating the treatment of identity permissions as a special case. > [!NOTE] > 默认情况下，代码访问安全性不会检查证据。By default, code access security does not check for evidence. 除非您的计算机具有基于的自定义代码组类，您可以通过跳过验证码签名验证来提高性能。Unless your computer has a custom code group based on the class, you can improve performance by bypassing Authenticode signature verification. 这通过配置运行时不提供实现代码访问安全性的证据。This is accomplished by configuring the runtime to not provide evidence for code access security. 详细了解如何配置此选项，该应用程序可以使用它，请参阅该元素。For more information about how to configure this option and which applications can use it, see the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks X.509 证书由 Authenticode 代码签名建立定义指定的软件发布者的标识。The X.509 certificate defines the identity of the specified software publisher, as established by Authenticode code signing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 或者创建一个完全受限制 (`None`) 或`Unrestricted`权限。Creates either a fully restricted (`None`) or `Unrestricted` permission. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，标识的权限不能具有权限状态值。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, identity permissions cannot have an permission state value. 从.NET Framework 2.0 版开始，标识权限可以具有任何权限状态值。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, identity permissions can have any permission state value. 这意味着在 2.0 及更高版本中，标识权限具有相同的行为与实现接口。This means that in 2.0 and later versions, identity permissions have the same behavior as permissions that implement the interface. 即，请求的标识始终成功，而不考虑程序集，标识程序集已被授予完全信任。That is, a demand for an identity always succeeds, regardless of the identity of the assembly, if the assembly has been granted full trust. 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，对标识权限的要求是有效，即使调用程序集是完全受信任。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, demands on the identity permissions are effective, even when the calling assembly is fully trusted. 也就是说，尽管调用程序集具有完全信任，但如果程序集不符合要求的条件故障的标识权限的需求。That is, although the calling assembly has full trust, a demand for an identity permission fails if the assembly does not meet the demanded criteria. 从.NET Framework 2.0 版开始，标识权限的要求是如果调用程序集具有完全信任关系无效。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, demands for identity permissions are ineffective if the calling assembly has full trust. 这可确保所有权限，消除标识权限的处理方式的一致性。This assures consistency for all permissions, eliminating the treatment of identity permissions as a special case. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 构造函数。The following example shows how to use the constructor. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermission#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermission/CPP/publisheridentitypermission.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermission#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermission/CS/publisheridentitypermission.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermission#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermission/VB/publisheridentitypermission.vb#7)]

summary.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

span.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 两个权限的交集是描述两者共同描述的操作组的权限。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the set of operations they both describe in common. 只有传递两个原始权限的请求将通过该交集。Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection. 仅支持集运算 (， ，和) 时当前权限是否等于指定的权限。 only supports set operations (, , and ) when the current permission is equal to the specified permission.

summary.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

span.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

span.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当前权限是否相等的两个权限是指定权限的子集。The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the two permissions are equal. 如果此方法返回`true`，当前权限与指定权限受保护的资源表示相同的访问权限。If this method returns `true`, the current permission represents the same access to the protected resource as the specified permission. 支持集运算 (， ，和) 仅当当前权限等于指定的权限。 supports set operations (, , and ) only when the current permission is equal to the specified permission.

param.name: target
param.span: A permission to combine with the current permission.

span.span: A permission to combine with the current permission.

param.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

span.span: Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

span.span: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对的调用结果方法是通过当前权限和指定的权限表示所表示的所有操作的权限。The result of a call to the method is a permission that represents all the operations represented by both the current permission and the specified permission. 任何请求都会通过任一权限传递其联合。Any demand that passes either permission passes their union. 类仅支持集运算 (， ，和) 时当前权限是否等于指定的权限。The class only supports set operations (, , and ) when the current permission is equal to the specified permission.
